page.title: 08POPULATION MOVEMENT
page.content: I moved to live down here recently from Birmingham.Since I've been here I have noticed that not all of the people who live in this area are Welsh.The area is not what I expected it to be.I notice that there are quite a lot of hamlets around,but there are hardly any shops.I live in a village called Bontdolgadfan.Really it is quite nice in our area because wherever you go you can see hills and trees all around you,and if you are lucky you might even see various kinds of birds,like the buzzard and heron. Some people own houses here,but only come here on weekends.Their houses are called second homes. My name is Susan Davies.
